sentences.sContent: The boy bounced out of the classroom.
sentences.sContent_eng: The boy bounced out of the classroom.
sentences.sCn: 那男孩突然从教室里奔出去。

sentences.sContent: The students swarmed out of the classroom.
sentences.sContent_eng: The students swarmed out of the classroom.
sentences.sCn: 学生们蜂拥着跑出了教室。

sentences.sContent: She fainted in the classroom and was carried out.
sentences.sContent_eng: She fainted in the classroom and was carried out.
sentences.sCn: 她在教室中昏过去了，并被抬了出来。

phrases.pCn: 教学楼；教学建筑；教学馆

trans.tranOther: a room that you have lessons in at a school or college
